channel.title: isync on Stock2Shop
channel.description: Recent content in isync on Stock2Shop

item.title: iSync
item.description: Update Stock2Shop hourly with Product data changes When changes are made to your iSync system, we can set an hourly time to check for Product updates. This can be set for which ever minute on the hour best suits your workflow. Sync specific Product data All Product data sent from iSync can be filtered as needed. We might not require a certain amount of details to be sent through with the needed Product data.
